page.title: 06Employment
page.content: People in Bethlehem work in many different places,but the most comman job is farming.The farmers have to feed the cattle,feed the sheep and suckle the calves and see to other jobs in the winter.In the summer he shears the sheep,makes silage and hay and dips the sheep.Many people go away to Cardiff or Swansea to work,some farthers work as firemen,mechanics, solicitors,nurses for the elderly or at the nearby concrete works at Llangadog.Some fathers work as mecanics,they have to mend cars and test them,some people teach.Many people work in our local towns of Llangadog,Llandovery and Llandeilo. Some people work in shops,pubs and hairdressers.Most of these jobs are found in the local towns.
